Key Match Events: Lautaro Martinez scored twice for Argentina
Post-Match Reflections: Lautaro Martinez's performance was redemptive after a poor World Cup performance
Argentina's depth was showcased in the absence of Messi
Miscellaneous Highlights: Argentina qualified for the Copa America quarterfinals
Peru was eliminated from the tournament
Others: Argentina made nine changes from their previous match
Walter Samuel served as interim manager for Argentina in Scaloni's absence
